meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Simmonds Brian Carrick Kerry Greene Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7041.

td.p: Eric Simmonds, an executive assistant from Los Angeles, California
Brian Carrick, a restaurant owner from Portland, Oregon
Kerry Greene, a volunteer guardian ad litem from Manchester, New Hampshire (whose 3-day cash winnings total $66,000)

tr.td: DOUBLE A
THE PRESIDENT'S PLEASURE
SUPPORTING THE TV SHOW
(Alex: You have to identify the TV show; we'll give you some of the supporting characters in those shows.)
AROUND THE WORLD
FACTA MORGANA
YOU MAY BE A WALNUT...
